title: "Lord of Death"
body:
Literally anything would have been better

http://i.imgur.com/Jgn9UZp.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/UEqTf1j.png

http://i.imgur.com/fHuYDd7.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/WAfK67b.jpg

Lord Synonyms http://www.thesaurus.com/browse/lord?s=t

aristocrat / baron / bishop / captain / commandant / commander / count
dad / don / duke / earl / governor / king / leader / liege / magnate / marquis
monarch / nobility / noble / nobleman / overlord / parliamentarian / patrician 
peer / potentate / prince / royalty / ruler / seigneur / sovereign / superior / viscount


Dead Iron King
Fullmetal Gravelord
Fullmetal Harbinger 
Soul Iron Scourge
Death Smith
Pain Smith 
Iron Phantom 
Viscount Vision 
Spirit Steel 
Death Metal Monster
Spirit Metal Specter 
Sovereign Specter
Magnate of Misery
Paladin of Pain
Secretary of Sadness
Marquis of Manacles 
Consul of Calamity
Duke of Dread
Prince of Pain
Tycoon of Torment
Ruler of Ruin
Royalty of Rito
Governor of Graves
Bishop of Bullshit
Sovereign of Souls
Ambassador of Affliction 
Grave Robber Gary

OR I DON'T KNOW HOW ABOUT MASTER OF METAL

replies.body: Grave Robber Gary.  {{champion:83}}'s true rival.

Who looks like a young Bill Cosby with shovel. He just keeps stealing Yorick's fame...
http://elinformanteshow.com/image.php/v2/images_uploaded/9619d5billcosby.jpg?width=700&image=/v2/images_uploaded/9619d5billcosby.jpg
you forgot Paladin of pain

Fix'd just for you 

http://i.imgur.com/F4JyrDn.png

Bishop of Bullshit.

You win.
I think that name really fits his new kit design.

He has metal powers. He has death powers. He's in an effin' band with Sona.

He's the Lord of Death Metal, just like the Prince of Pop and the King of Rock.

> [{quoted}](name=Brascus,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=pEcUmdEw,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-10-15T03:18:16.585+0000)
>
> OR I DON'T KNOW HOW ABOUT MASTER OF METAL

hmmmm i think you're on to something with this name

> [{quoted}](name=Snake Town,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=pEcUmdEw,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2015-10-15T13:58:17.730+0000)
>
> hmmmm i think you're on to something with this name

It's strangely evocative. It would also fit with his ability names. What an ingenious idea!
ikr
Sovereign of Death sounds pretty cool.

They all sound pretty cool next to "lord of death"

Might as well call him Baron of Boners

> [{quoted}](name=Brascus,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=pEcUmdEw,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2015-10-15T09:23:32.467+0000)
>
> Might as well call him Baron of Boners

Rito pls
No, Brian is better.

If they must change it im in favor of Iron Phantom.
Keeps metal, keeps him dead. Fits morde pretty well

{{champion:82}} The Iron Phantom

See cant you just hear Phreak reading that in a Champion spotlight?
Since his new lore says he refuses to die. Mordekaiser, Defier of Death.

> [{quoted}](name=PRIMAWESOME,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=pEcUmdEw,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-10-15T03:53:32.386+0000)
>
> Since his new lore says he refuses to die. Mordekaiser, Defier of Death.

The awkward moment when {{champion:30}}'s passive is literally "Death Defied".

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/lasmacabrasaventurasdebillyymandy/images/2/24/Lord_Pain_Artwork.png/revision/latest?cb=20130303183350&path-prefix=es

Mordekaiser Pre-Undead confirmed.
I really like Fullmetal Harbinger if we have to have it changed. But for the love of all that is unholy, not Lord of Death
I'm not completely opposed to the name change, just... why such a lazy, low-effort name? That sounds like something a 12 year old names a villain for his Steven Universe fanfiction.
Yeah it is really slap dash, seems to be the case with everything Mordekaiser lately, dude can't catch a break
I wish you made a poll of those suggestions. Then I wish I had more than 1 vote.
Should I repost with a poll then or should I call rito? D:
No need to call Riot when you could call your local congressman and put the vote in the hands of the people!
Congressman rito por favor
The mistake you are making is thinking that they care.
My biggest problem with this change is that it is one of the most redundant titles ever.  "Hello, I am Death Emperor the Lord of Death."

I'll lend you some facepalm gifs.
http://replygif.net/i/894.gif
http://media.giphy.com/media/TeSpMJcp1R6la/giphy.gif
http://i176.photobucket.com/albums/w198/Invderlava/Gifs/Facepalm.gif
http://media.giphy.com/media/fNBFa6NCMeZJm/giphy.gif

{{champion:82}} x Lamb confirmed

and even in kinky way xD

He's just not going to be the same after the title and Lore change. :( He used to live off of people's suffering and agony and now he's just a dude that enslaves souls like.. I dunno... THRESH... and his new title is Lord of DEATH, which is practically the same as Karthus's... Though if he's enslaving souls, he's not Lord of Death, he's, like... Oh, I dunno... Jeffers-, okay, I won't make a slavery joke.
LMAO at Bishop of Bullshit and Grave Robber Gary.
Bump
Your contribution has not gone unnoticed forum warrior take my 1+

"Prince of Pain" son of QoP?

If we don't get Master of Metal back then I vote for Grave Robber Gary.

> [{quoted}](name=Brascus,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=pEcUmdEw,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-10-15T03:18:16.585+0000)
>
> Royalty of Rito

Petition to make this a thing.
The Sultan of Swat!  The Great Bambino!
"Magnate of Misery" I feel you.
Duke of Dread, i like it.
I kinda like Iron (or METAL) Phantom.
Lord of Pain is better

"Royalty of Rito"

If only he was treated like it...

Metal doesn't really have to do with his kit anymore.

Or his lore.

I mean, his connection to metal is his metal suit with his metal weapon, but pretty much any knight-like champion can claim that.
Aside fron the W... I don´t know, maybe the fact, that he wears a FULL BODY METAL armor, and the most iconic thing atm (his Q) is smashing the enemy 3 times with the big-ass IRON- (metal)CLUB.

Kayle is also covered in metal from head to toe in metal. Her sword is also metal. Kayle master of metal confirmed.

Samething for Azir, Blitzcrank, Darius, Diana, Garen, Jarvan, Nautalis, Orianna, Poppy, Quinn, and probably a couplpe of others. Masters of Metal Confirmed.

Don't forget about Graves new title! 

Graves, Caesar of Cigars.  Oh wait, nooooo Ritoooo!
His W literally covers people in magnetic metal that shreds people

>Royalty of Rito


https://twistedsifter.files.wordpress.com/2015/10/go-bluejays-9.gif
Not to annoy any Mordekaiser mains who might disagree with me, but I think Dead Iron King sounds better than Master of Metal
Gravelord Nito laughs at this edgy boy Mordekaiser.

Sigh, and before you know it, Riot may one day make another Tank-related update, with its title including the word "Juggernaut".

As if we have not have enough of that word already......

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/otIcwEum-next-time-if-theres-any-tank-related-updates-stop-using-the-word-juggernaut
